name: DEQMPopulationReferenceExtension
title: DEQM Population Reference Extension
description: Identifies which measure population that a specific resource is used for evaluating their logics by referencing population criteria id (`Measure.group.population.id`) specified in Measure resource. For a multiple performance rate measure, referencing population criteria group (`Measure.group.id`) is necessary to identify a measure population within a population criteria group.

element.definition: Reference a measure population or a measure population within a population criteria group by referencing their unique id specified in a Measure resource.

element.short: This id SHOULD reference population criteria id or population criteria group id specified in a Measure resource.
